column4: my display flickers every minute - it goes blank for about 2 seconds. Ideas?
It's a new laptop, and it's cold. The external display (HDMI) is flickering; the laptop screen doesn't.
checked connectors? got a similar problem a while back. connector got damaged by fall.
I did; the connector seems fine too, and it's working well 98% of the time
out of ideas.. :-( still seems to me as if something is "resetting"
yes that's possible. dmesg log and syslog didn't have any info on this.
and now it's flickering every 15 secs
suspect electronic component.. no idea which one of course. absense of log messages seems to point to hardware too.
can you connect another monitor? to see if its the monitor thats causing it?
other monitor was doing something worse; this is the second one.
it still could be the cable, but suspect your laptop has a defective (external) video interface. My condolences...
different behavior with different monitors - i'm not sure what's the case. I'll call the tech support now :)
